title: How Pakistan’s Bitcoin Gambit Signals Shift Away From Dollar Dominance
description: Pakistan's Bitcoin pivot is publicly aligned with U.S. cryptocurrency initiatives, but it reveals a broader movement among developing nations to reduce dollar dependency.
content: President Donald Trump holds up a signed executive order in the Oval Office of the White House on ... More January 23, 2025 in Washington, DC. Trump signed a range of executive orders pertaining to i… [+6875 chars]
